form.name: form1

span.div:
Meals for Heath City School students (any under 18 in the city of Heath) will be provided on every scheduled school day for the remainder of the time that our school buildings are closed. If you have not already done so and are in need of meals, please click the "Food Order Form" link above.
Weekly Pickup Option: We will have meals available for pick-up from the locations listed below at the prescribed times on Mondays only beginning April 6th. Individuals will need to pick up a week's worth of food from the locations.
Weekly Delivery Option: If you choose a delivery option you will receive a full week of food delivered on Monday of each week. This means there will be one bulk delivery per week.
1. Garfield Elementary Core Room: 11:00am – 11:30am.
2. Ramp Creek (Outside the Community Room): 11:00am – 11:30am.
3. Watson Road Apartments Parking Lot, 12:00pm – 12:30pm.
4. Noah’s Ark Parking Lot (by office), 12:00pm – 12:30pm.

div.style: margin-top:25px; margin-left:13px; float:left; background-color:White; padding:7px 5px; border-radius:4px;

div.span: Ensuring all students learn and grow is our collective responsibility.
